Latitude: Measures the distance North and South of the Equator
Longitude: Measures the distance between East and West (EW)
The PRIME MERIDIAN runs through Greenwich, England at 0 degrees

Latitude: The +ve values reporesent the NORTHERN Hempisphere (or moving north)
Longitude: The +ve values represent the EASTERN Hemisphere (or moving east)

Latitude: the -vs values represent the SOUTHERN Hemisphere (or moving south)
Longitude: the -ve values represent the WESTERN Hemisphere (or moving west)

Latitude: Latitude tells us where we are in the "Y" direction
Longitude: Longitude tells us where we are in the "X" direction
